originalText.text: The best facialist. Been with Kristen since 2016. The customer service, her expertise, her kindness, her warmth. She is the best provider I know. So happy. My skin has gotten so much better. Could never ask for anything for better with Kristen

text.text: The best facialist. Been with Kristen since 2016. The customer service, her expertise, her kindness, her warmth. She is the best provider I know. So happy. My skin has gotten so much better. Could never ask for anything for better with Kristen

originalText.text: I love working with Kristen! I started with her at the beginning of my pregnancy, and she has significantly improved my skin, while only using the most gentle, pregnancy-safe products and procedures. I can't wait to see what she can do once I'm not pregnant! I walk out of each facial looking wonderful, and in the weeks that follow I continue to see improvement. Kristen is extremely knowledgable and experienced, gives great advice, is generous with her time and product samples, and truly cares about her clients. She has a magical touch and her massage is heaven. I cannot recommend her highly enough! This is my one indulgence and it is completely worth it.

text.text: I love working with Kristen! I can't wait to see what she can do once I'm not pregnant! I walk out of each facial looking wonderful, and in the weeks that follow I continue to see improvement. Kristen is extremely knowledgable and experienced, gives great advice, is generous with her time and product samples, and truly cares about her clients. She has a magical touch and her massage is heaven. I cannot recommend her highly enough! This is my one indulgence and it is completely worth it.

originalText.text: I have been having facials done by Kristen for the last several years. I have extremely sensitive skin and Kristen always knows how to make it look and feel amazing. She is incredibly knowledgeable and completely passionate about her work. She has helped me find the best products to help my skin improve and see lasting results.

text.text: I have been having facials done by Kristen for the last several years. I have extremely sensitive skin and Kristen always knows how to make it look and feel amazing. She is incredibly knowledgeable and completely passionate about her work. She has helped me find the best products to help my skin improve and see lasting results.

originalText.text: I absolutely love anything organic and holistic so I was thrilled to have found Kristen Leigh.  Her facials are results driven using healthy products that I know are good for my skin. My skin can be somewhat sensitive and with her customized treatments, I have seen great improvement in my skin. Also, having a son, I am concerned with using safe products & Kristen has been a helpful advocate in choosing the safest products for him and my family. She has always tailored my treatments according to my concerns. She is also responsive to any questions that I may have in between treatments.

originalText.text: I have been a client of Kristen's for 9 years and have always found her facials invigorating. She is extremely knowledgeable and takes the time to explain the benefits of her treatments and products. Kristen also personalizes her treatments to meet your needs. I recently had the stem cell facial and my skin has never felt and looked better. Her spa is relaxing and a welcome escape from the fast pace of life!
